version_description: Now it just takes the entire width of screen
Now it just takes the entire width of screen

- Built for actual iOS version;
- Added the week numbers;
- Fixed the possibility to choose the dark colors.

And working on Dark Mode support and partial redesign for next version

- Built for actual iOS version;
- Added the week numbers;
- Fixed the possibility to choose the dark colors.

And working on Dark Mode support and partial redesign for next version

Fixed:
- The current day marking issue after navigating through months;
- Rare incorrect dates rendering in weekly view;

Fixed:
- The current day marking issue after navigating through months;
- Rare incorrect dates rendering in weekly view;
Now, you can move MiniMonth right onto your Home screen as Widget!
